# Function reference

## 🐼 Pandas Extensions

Time series functions that manipulate DataFrames.

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [summarize_by_time](summarize_by_time.qmd#timetk.summarize_by_time.summarize_by_time) | The `summarize_by_time` function aggregates data by a specified time period and one or more numeric columns, allowing for grouping and customization of the aggregation. |
